Frequency once per day

You summon an aura of swirling wind and lightning.

For 1 minute, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealment} against creatures more than 5 feet away, and any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of you suffers [[/r 1d12[electricity]]] damage damage (basic Reflex save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).

At [[/r 2d12[electricity]]]{13th} and [[/r 3d12[electricity]]]{17th} level, this damage increases by 1d12.
